Utilities.Media

Class MediaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities.Media.MediaManager

  • public class MediaManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Media manager. Indexes all media found in given directories and stores them for later use

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      protected boolean keepIndexing 
      protected java.lang.String mediaDriveLetter 
      protected java.lang.String movieDir 
      protected MediaList movieList 
      protected java.lang.String musicDir 
      protected MediaList songList

    • Constructor Detail

      • MediaManager

        public MediaManager(java.lang.String mediaDir,
                    java.lang.String musicDir,
                    java.lang.String movieDir)
        Media Manager default constructor
        Parameters:
        mediaDir - String root media directory. Must contain both musicDir and movieDir within the directory
        musicDir - String root music directory. Must contain all music, can be organized into other folders
        movieDir - String root movie directory. Must contain all movies, can be organized into other folders

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public void index(boolean keepIndexing,
                  int delayMinutes)
        Index media
        Parameters:
        keepIndexing - boolean false indexing once, true if indexing every 30 minutes
        delayMinutes - int delay between indexing attempts in minutes

      • isIndexed

        public boolean isIndexed()
        Check if indexing is complete
        Returns:
        boolean indexing complete

      • close

        public void close()
        Stop indexing media. Uses thread.stop() (which is depreciated)

      • getSongList

        public MediaList getSongList()
        Retrieve the Song List
        Returns:
        MediaList song list

      • getSong

        public java.lang.String[] getSong(java.lang.String songName)
        Retrieve all songs matching a given name
        Parameters:
        songName - String song name
        Returns:
        String[] all song paths (without drive letter) matching songName

      • getMovieList

        public MediaList getMovieList()
        Retrieve the Movie List
        Returns:
        MediaList movie list

      • getMovie

        public java.lang.String[] getMovie(java.lang.String movieName)
        Retrieve all movies matching a given name
        Parameters:
        movieName - String movie name
        Returns:
        String[] all movie paths (without drive letter) matching movieName
